text: You won’t believe what scientists just discovered about coffee! The shocking truth they don’t want you to know is right here. Click before it’s taken down…

analysis.recommendation: This text lacks substantial information and employs sensationalism to attract clicks. It is recommended to seek out more reliable and informative sources for news about scientific discoveries related to coffee.
